titleInfo.title: Bobby C. Price at the Convention Hall (17341)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing a country music show with Bobby G. Rice at the Convention Hall on February 27. Poster features metal photoplates of Bobby G. Rice, Rusty and Nashville Loco - Motion and Rita Remington. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/24822.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
